name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Delicious and simple chocolate chip cookies
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit
Scoop the dough into golf-ball sized mounds

name: Tea
directions: Put tea bag on hot water until the tea is the desired color

name: PB & J
directions: Put the desired amount of peanut butter on one piece of bread
Put the desired amount of jelly on the other piece of bread
